CustomField.description: Primary phone number for the candidate. Format: (XXX) XXX-XXXX or XXX-XXX-XXXX. Used for contact and may be used to match existing Account/Contact records. This is a key contact method for enrollment follow-up.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Enter the candidate's primary phone number. Accepts formats like (555) 123-4567 or 555-123-4567. This number may be used to match existing Account or Contact records.
CustomField.label: Phone
